item.description:
Join me for dinner after our astronomy presentation!

I picked a restaurant that has both vegetarian and meat food: Bukhara Indian Bistro, 701 Centre Street in Jamaica Plain.

NOTE: This time is an estimate; we'll just head to the restaurant whenever we're done with the astronomy presentation. (So only RSVP for dinner if you're also going to the astronomy presentation)

Your YES needs to be a firm YES, so I can give the reservation to the restaurant. It would be rude for you to RSVP Yes and then not show up--cheating the restaurant out of money and making me look bad. Maybes will need to change to Yes/No by the day before.


Note: at least 3 people need to be going in order for this dinner to be held.



The restaurant is (more or less) accessible by public transit (get off the Orange Line at Green Street or Forest Hills and walk up to Centre Street, or take the 39 bus from Brookline Village or Forest Hills).
After dinner, we can easily head up to Larz Anderson Park.
item.name: Dinner after astronomy
